item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Shaily Engineer and Market Trends for Sep 2025
item.description: The Sep-2025 quarter earnings season has seen 4,000 companies report results, revealing a mixed landscape across market capitalisations and sectors. Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, and Shaily Engineer have emerged as notable performers in their respective categories, while overall profit growth and positive result proportions reflect nuanced trends in the Indian equity market. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: GE Power Joins MomentumNow Stocks on Strong Financial Footing
item.description: GE Power, a small-cap player in the Heavy Electrical Equipment sector, has been added to the MomentumNow Stocks list as of 23 December 2025, reflecting its recent financial performance and alignment with momentum-driven investment strategies. Time: 4 hours ago

item.title: D B Corp Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: D B Corp, a key player in the Media & Entertainment sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a weakening momentum in the stock’s price trajectory. Time: 5 hours ago
